France. Convention nationale
Anarchists
metadata.title: J.P. Brissot, deputy of Eure and Loire, to his constituents, on the situation of the National Convention : on the influence of the anarchists, and the evils it has caused, and on the necessity of annihilating that influence in order to save the Republic /
metadata.creator: Brissot de Warville, J.-P. (Jacques-Pierre), 1754-1793.
Brissot de Warville, J.-P. (Jacques-Pierre), 1754-1793
Burke, William, 1730-1798, translator
Burke, Edmund, 1729-1797
Stockdale, John, 1749?-1814, publisher
metadata.publisher: London : Printed for John Stockdale, Picadilly,
metadata.description: Translation of: J.P. Brissot, député du département d'Eure et Loire, à ses commettans, sur la situation de la Convention nationale
Translated by William Burke; revised and with a preface by Edmund Burke. Cf. ESTC
"A list of books printed for John Stockdale"--P. [2]-[7] at end
"A catalogue of books, printed for John Stockdale"--P. [8]-[31] at end
Variant of Martin & Walter. Révolution française, I, 5818
metadata.notes: Title page located on front cover. No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Worn, stained, damaged pages and cover. Skewed text. Uneven binding.
